title: 11/12: Waiver Wire - Brian Hill and Who Else? (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Whether you need to win now or you're looking to stash someone for a playoff run, we've got Waiver Wire options for you to consider, starting of course with Brian Hill. Who are the other top priorities (4:00)? Players with good matchups (6:15) include Gerald Everett among a big group of TEs, Kyle Allen and even Kalen Ballage ... The big news (10:00) with important injury updates, and then we get into our top priorities at each position. QB (15:00) including Allen and Nick Foles, RB (17:40) including Derrius Guice and J.D. McKissic, WR (22:40) including Dede Westbrook and Deebo Samuel, TE (25:30) including O.J. Howard and maybe Ross Dwelley. Plus DSTs and Kickers ... Recapping MIN-DAL (30:00) and SF-SEA (36:50) with our Fantasy takeaways. Then we debate who should be dropped this week like Jaylen Samuels and Latavius Murray (41:30) before taking an in-depth look at the Waiver Wire at each position (47:30) with some IDP talk at the very end of the show ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
